data.text: @nzherald Omicron is a cold, what is catastrophic is the government mandates.
@nzherald Well-being of NZers should always come first. As Jacinda has done. Thanking her!! Will those who continue to slay her name apologise? Probably not.
@nzherald Omicron is not catastrophic, government policy is!

@craw_deane @everythingj4ck @nzherald The repeated lockdowns, that caused the financial destruction of the entire NZ restaurant industry - went against even WHO recommendations - and were shown to be unnessary by Sweden, Florida, Texas etc

@everythingj4ck @nzherald No they are not of course but then some are suggesting suddenly that it was too early to have opened up because their staff are all going off with Covid.  Its a nasty situation for sure but it was/is one hell of a juggling act that will never has total agreement.
@nzherald The govement is catastrophic. Not covid.
@nzherald Omicron isnâ€™t the problem, the ridiculous rules are.
@PossumPicnic @nzherald Short sharp lockdown 😂like the 4 month one is Auckland last year. Get real

@WedsGee @nzherald So many employers have survived staff sickness meaning lack of staff by simply making the sick staff come in anyway. 
Covid means they have to isolate and suddenly, oh no! We haven't got the staff to cover.
